comment: Covishield is approved by WHO and it is Oxford AstraZeneca vaccine. Covaxin is not yet approved. They made it with the virus that attack chimpanzees not anything from chimpanzees.
amr:
# ::snt Covishield is approved by WHO and it is Oxford AstraZeneca vaccine. Covaxin is not yet approved. They made it with the virus that attack chimpanzees not anything from chimpanzees.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / approve-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "WHO"))
                  :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Covishield")))
            :op2 (v2 / vaccine
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Oxford"
                        :op2 "AstraZeneca")
                  :domain v))
      :snt2 (a3 / approve-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (p / product
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Covaxin"))
            :time (y / yet))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they)
                  :ARG1 (v3 / virus
                        :ARG0-of (a4 / attack-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / chimps))))
            :ARG2 (m3 / make-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (a5 / anything
                        :source c2))))
